deliverables.title: OSINT Reconnaissance
deliverables.description: Gather publicly available information about the target organization
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM hosts WHERE hostname IS NOT NULL

deliverables.title: DNS Enumeration
deliverables.description: Enumerate DNS records, subdomains, and zone transfers
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%DNS%'

deliverables.title: Port Scanning
deliverables.description: Identify open ports and services on external-facing systems
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM services

deliverables.title: SSL/TLS Assessment
deliverables.description: Evaluate SSL/TLS configurations and certificate security
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%SSL%' OR title LIKE '%TLS%' OR title LIKE '%certificate%'

deliverables.title: Vulnerability Assessment
deliverables.description: Identify and validate vulnerabilities in perimeter systems
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE severity IN ('critical', 'high')

deliverables.title: Remote Service Exploitation
deliverables.description: Attempt exploitation of remote services (VPN, RDP, SSH, etc.)
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM services WHERE port IN (22, 3389, 443, 1194)
